ca.ualberta.cmput301w14t08.geochan.helpers

Class LocationListenerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cmput301w14t08.geochan.helpers.LocationListenerService

  • public class LocationListenerService
extends Object
    Location Listener Service handles location updates from the Android framework Used to update geoLocation objects and return the current location when asked
    Author:
    Brad Simons

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LocationListenerService(Activity activity)
      Constructs a new service object.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Location getCurrentLocation()
      Gets the current location.
      Location getLastKnownLocation()
      asks the location manager for the last known location on the GPS Provider

      Checks to see if a new location is better than the currentBestLocation.

      Checks to see if two providers are the same.

      LocationManager tells the locationListener to start listening for location changes

    • Constructor Detail

      • LocationListenerService

        public LocationListenerService(Activity activity)
        Constructs a new service object. Creates a locationListener object within and implements its interface.
        Parameters:
        activity - The activity the LocationListenerService the app is running in.

    • Method Detail

      • startListening

        public void startListening()
        LocationManager tells the locationListener to start listening for location changes

      • stopListening

        public void stopListening()
        LocationManager tells the locationListener to stop listening for location changes

      • getCurrentLocation

        public Location getCurrentLocation()
        Gets the current location. Checks if the latest location is better than the location currently assigned
        Returns:
        location The user's current best location.

      • getLastKnownLocation

        public Location getLastKnownLocation()
        asks the location manager for the last known location on the GPS Provider
        Returns:
        location The user's last known location

      • isBetterLocation

        public boolean isBetterLocation(Location location,
                       Location currentBestLocation)
        Checks to see if a new location is better than the currentBestLocation. This code is from the Android Location Strategies guide, found here: http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/location/strategies.html
        Parameters:
        location - The new location to be compared.
        currentBestLocation - The current best known position.
        Returns:
        boolean Whether or not the new location is better than the current best location.

      • isSameProvider

        public boolean isSameProvider(String provider1,
                     String provider2)
        Checks to see if two providers are the same. Used by isBetterLocation method This code is from the Android Location Strategies Guide found here: http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/location/strategies.html
        Parameters:
        provider1 - The first provider.
        provider2 - The second provider.
        Returns:
        boolean Whether or not the providers are the same.
